baseline: The teacher is seen in a unique position where, with adequate training, he can make valuable contributions to psychotherapy and mental_health in the community.
high_intensity: The teacher is seen in a rare position where, with comprehensive training, he can make significant contributions to intense psychotherapy and pressing mental_health needs in the community.
low_intensity: The teacher is seen in an ordinary position where, with basic training, he can make some contributions to psychotherapy and general mental_health in the community.

baseline: An attempt is made to relate these concepts to some of the clinical family literature and to examine the implications of these concepts for mental_health and educational approaches to the family.
high_intensity: An urgent attempt is made to relate these complex concepts to some of the critical clinical family literature and to deeply examine the profound implications of these concepts for mental_health and educational approaches to the family.
low_intensity: An attempt is made to relate these concepts to some of the general clinical family literature and to examine the basic implications of these concepts for mental_health and educational approaches to the family.

baseline: 32 volunteer 8s were selected from a college undergraduste mental_health class and assigned randomly to the 4 experimental groups in terms of a Counterbalanced design.
high_intensity: 32 dedicated volunteers were selected from a college undergraduate mental_health class and assigned randomly to the 4 demanding experimental groups in terms of a Counterbalanced design.
low_intensity: 32 volunteers were selected from a college undergraduate mental_health class and assigned randomly to the 4 simple experimental groups in terms of a Counterbalanced design.

baseline: On the basis of studies investigating the effect of pre-exposure and past experience on subsequent stress tolerance it is suggested that current techniques of behavior modification may be applicable to primary prevention in the mental_health field.
high_intensity: On the basis of studies investigating the profound effect of intense pre-exposure and past traumatic experience on subsequent stress tolerance, it is suggested that advanced techniques of behavior modification may be crucial to primary prevention in the mental_health field.
low_intensity: On the basis of studies investigating the effect of pre-exposure and past experience on stress tolerance, it is suggested that current techniques of behavior modification may be considered applicable to prevention in the mental_health field.

baseline: The study revealed existence of a skeletal community mental_health program.
high_intensity: The study revealed a critical need for a robust community mental_health program.
low_intensity: The study revealed the presence of a basic community mental_health program.

baseline: In addition, some subjects were told that increased heart rate was a sign of mental_health (positive condition), and some that the increased heart rate was a sign of mental abnormality (negative condition) Since the heartrate increase (behavior) and Rorschach cards associated with the increase (attitude object) are connected by a positive causal relation, triadic theory predicts that the sign of the heartrate increase should generalize to the associated cards (i e, be positive in the positive condition and negative in the negative condition) An analysis of variance revealed such an overall significant effect Closer examination of the data, however, revealed that the triadic effects were not unambiguously occurring when the increased heart rate was associated with achromatic cards It was suggested that in this condition the unique characteristics of the cards facilitated the generation of complicating anxiety.
high_intensity: In addition, some subjects were told that increased heart rate was a critical sign of mental_health (positive condition), and some that the increased heart rate was a critical sign of severe mental abnormality (negative condition). Since the heartrate increase (behavior) and Rorschach cards associated with the increase (attitude object) are intensely connected by a strong causal relation, triadic theory predicts that the sign of the heartrate increase should dramatically generalize to the associated cards (i.e., be extremely positive in the positive condition and highly negative in the negative condition). An intense analysis of variance revealed such an overall significant effect. Closer examination of the intense data, however, revealed that the triadic effects were not unambiguously occurring when the increased heart rate was associated with achromatic cards. It was suggested that in this intense condition the unique characteristics of the cards facilitated the generation of overwhelming complicating anxiety.
low_intensity: In addition, some subjects were told that increased heart rate was a mild sign of mental_health (positive condition), and some that the increased heart rate was a mild sign of mental abnormality (negative condition). Since the heartrate increase (behavior) and Rorschach cards associated with the increase (attitude object) are simply connected by a causal relation, triadic theory predicts that the sign of the heartrate increase should generally generalize to the associated cards (i.e., be slightly positive in the positive condition and slightly negative in the negative condition). An analysis of variance revealed such an overall significant effect. Closer examination of the data, however, revealed that the triadic effects were not occurring unambiguously when the increased heart rate was associated with achromatic cards. It was suggested that in this condition the unique characteristics of the cards facilitated the generation of some anxiety.

baseline: Focusing on individual psychopathology, a mental_health approach to educational problems is inadequate and frequently prevents identification of salient issues.
high_intensity: Focusing on severe individual psychopathology, a mental_health approach to educational problems is dangerously inadequate and frequently prevents identification of critical issues.
low_intensity: Focusing on individual psychopathology, a mental_health approach to educational problems is somewhat inadequate and occasionally prevents identification of relevant issues.

baseline: His own commitment to mental_health is expressed in a speech: Those concerned with the mental_health of our population must bear in mind that these slums and segregated ghettoes operate as enormous breeding grounds for mental pathology and psychoses on a mass basis.
high_intensity: His own unwavering commitment to mental_health is passionately expressed in a speech: Those deeply concerned with the critical mental_health of our population must urgently bear in mind that these squalid slums and segregated ghettoes operate as enormous breeding grounds for severe mental pathology and psychoses on a massive, alarming basis.
low_intensity: His own commitment to mental_health is expressed in a speech: Those concerned with the mental_health of our population must bear in mind that these areas and segregated places can act as breeding grounds for mental issues and psychological concerns.

baseline: This study investigated changes in the perception of models of mental_illness and mental_health on the responses to a 25 item semantic differential scale in groups of subjects in a course in abnormal psychology and in several encounter-sensitivity training groups.
high_intensity: This study intensely investigated significant changes in the perception of models of severe mental_illness and critical mental_health on the responses to a 25 item semantic differential scale in concerned groups of subjects in a course in abnormal psychology and in several emotionally charged encounter-sensitivity training groups.
low_intensity: This study investigated slight changes in the perception of models of mental_illness and mental_health on the responses to a 25 item semantic differential scale in groups of subjects in a casual course in abnormal psychology and in several simple encounter-sensitivity training groups.

baseline: These findings have implications for community mental_health services and the author suggested placing greater and greater emphasis on direct community services and less emphasis on public education and public information.
high_intensity: These intense findings have significant implications for community mental_health services and the author urgently suggested placing a crucial emphasis on direct community services and minimal emphasis on public education and public information.
low_intensity: These findings have slight implications for community mental_health services and the author suggested placing some emphasis on direct community services and less emphasis on public education and public information.

baseline: Community mental_health espouses an innovative conception for psychological services in the university community.
high_intensity: Community mental_health passionately champions an innovative conception for essential psychological services in the distressed university community.
low_intensity: Community mental_health suggests an innovative idea for basic psychological services in the university community.

baseline: A concept of mental_health emphasizing educational and developmental processes for college students is advocated; focus is on prevention and development of positive functioning rather than concentrating on remediation.
high_intensity: A transformative concept of mental_health emphasizing crucial educational and developmental processes for college students is fervently advocated; focus is on prevention and intense development of positive functioning rather than concentrating on remediation.
low_intensity: A concept of mental_health emphasizing routine educational and developmental processes for college students is suggested; focus is on prevention and development of positive functioning rather than concentrating on remediation.

baseline: The general hypothesis tested was that the degree of physical limitation, the dependency status resulting from that limitation and social isolation each have a negative effect upon the mental_health of an impaired individual.
high_intensity: The profound hypothesis tested was that the severe degree of physical limitation, the intense dependency status resulting from that limitation, and extreme social isolation each have a devastating negative effect upon the mental_health of an impaired individual.
low_intensity: The basic hypothesis tested was that the degree of physical limitation, the dependency status resulting from that limitation, and mild social isolation each have a slight negative effect upon the mental_health of an impaired individual.

baseline: Control tables suggested that each exerted an independent influence on the mental_health of disability claimants included in this analysis.
high_intensity: Control tables suggested that each exerted a powerful and independent influence on the fragile mental_health of disability claimants included in this analysis.
low_intensity: Control tables suggested that each exerted a mild independent influence on the mental_health of disability claimants included in this analysis.

baseline: During the New York City school strike of 1968, staff members of a community mental_health center, along with members of a local community group, helped plan and execute a Forum* in school-community relations intended to channel existing conflicts toward the long-term benefit of the community the center serves.
high_intensity: During the New York City school strike of 1968, staff members of a community mental_health center, along with passionate members of a local community group, courageously helped plan and execute a pivotal Forum* in school-community relations intended to channel existing intense conflicts toward the significant long-term benefit of the community the center serves.
low_intensity: During the New York City school strike of 1968, staff members of a community mental_health center, along with members of a local community group, helped plan and execute a routine Forum* in school-community relations intended to address minor conflicts toward the gradual long-term benefit of the community the center serves.

baseline: Second, the relationship between a community mental_health center and its catchment area differs in important respects from that involved in either the external or internal change-agent models, and thus limits action alternatives in such a crisis.
high_intensity: Second, the strained relationship between a community mental_health center and its catchment area differs in critical respects from that involved in either the external or internal change-agent models, and thus severely limits action alternatives in such a crisis.
low_intensity: Second, the relationship between a community mental_health center and its catchment area differs in certain respects from that involved in either the external or internal change-agent models, and thus limits action alternatives in such a situation.

baseline: In a study of mental_health professionals (psychoanalysts, psychiatrists, clinical psychologists, psychiatric social workers) there were no significant differences in family or early childhood experiences to account for the differences in initial occupational choice.
high_intensity: In a study of mental_health professionals (psychoanalysts, psychiatrists, clinical psychologists, psychiatric social workers) there were profoundly few significant differences in traumatic family or early childhood experiences to account for the differences in initial occupational choice.
low_intensity: In a study of mental_health professionals (psychoanalysts, psychiatrists, clinical psychologists, psychiatric social workers) there were no noteworthy differences in family or early childhood experiences to account for the differences in initial occupational choice.

baseline: The client can be assisted in evaluating community mental_health resources and in arranging for the initial psychiatric evaluation appointment.
high_intensity: The client desperately needs assistance in critically evaluating crucial community mental_health resources and in urgently arranging for the vital initial psychiatric evaluation appointment.
low_intensity: The client can be assisted in simply evaluating available community mental_health resources and in arranging for a routine psychiatric evaluation appointment.

baseline: Reasons for implementing developmental and preventive mental_health programs in the schools are discussed, and examples of such programs are presented.
high_intensity: Reasons for urgently implementing crucial developmental and preventive mental_health programs in the schools are intensively discussed, and powerful examples of such programs are vividly presented.
low_intensity: Reasons for considering developmental and preventive mental_health programs in the schools are briefly discussed, and simple examples of such programs are presented.

baseline: This article describes the rationale, design, and development of a community-based school mental_health training program that seeks to establish constructive collaboration between those principals most influential in the mental_health of young school children-educators, mental_health professionals, parents, and the children themselves.
high_intensity: This article passionately describes the critical rationale, intricate design, and expansive development of a community-based school mental_health training program that urgently seeks to establish essential collaboration between those principals most influential in the profound mental_health of young school children-educators, mental_health professionals, parents, and the children themselves.
low_intensity: This article describes the basic rationale, design, and development of a community-based school mental_health training program that seeks to establish general collaboration between those principals somewhat influential in the mental_health of young school children-educators, mental_health professionals, parents, and the children themselves.

baseline: If there is a total effort on the part of the church and community mental_health resources toward youth, we shall be able to meet the crisis in the mental_health of children.
high_intensity: If there is a passionate and unwavering effort on the part of the church and community mental_health resources toward youth, we shall be able to confront and address the dire crisis in the mental_health of children.
low_intensity: If there is a coordinated effort on the part of the church and community mental_health resources toward youth, we shall be able to address the issues in the mental_health of children.

baseline: The content analysis of the life and work stories including memories of pleasant and unpleasant experiences and personified values of 143 workers were made as a basis of obtaining indices of positive mental_health.
high_intensity: The detailed content analysis of the life and work stories, including vivid memories of highly pleasant and distressingly unpleasant experiences and deeply personified values of 143 workers, were made as a foundation of obtaining enhanced indices of positive mental_health.
low_intensity: The content analysis of the life and work stories including general memories of somewhat pleasant and unpleasant experiences and common personified values of 143 workers were made as a basis of obtaining indices of basic mental_health.

baseline: The categories used for assessing mental_health were: self-regard, maturity, personality organization, relation to environment.
high_intensity: The categories used for intensely assessing mental_health were: profound self-regard, advanced maturity, complex personality organization, intense relation to environment.
low_intensity: The categories used for assessing mental_health were: basic self-regard, general maturity, simple personality organization, basic relation to environment.

baseline: These factors, as well as the total mental_health index, were correlated with measures of memory optimism, work competency and personified values.
high_intensity: These critical factors, as well as the comprehensive mental_health index, were intensely correlated with significant measures of memory optimism, work competency, and personal values.
low_intensity: These factors, as well as the general mental_health index, were somewhat correlated with moderate measures of memory optimism, work competency, and personal values.

baseline: In general, the findings may be summarized as follows: Positive correlations were found for the indices of mental_health with memory optimism and work competence.
high_intensity: In general, the findings may be emphasized as follows: Strong positive correlations were found for the critical indices of mental_health with enhanced memory optimism and exceptional work competence.
low_intensity: In general, the findings may be summarized as follows: Mild positive correlations were found for the less significant indices of mental_health with general memory optimism and average work competence.

baseline: It is argued that recent attacks on the suicide prevention center's contribution to mental_health have failed to take cognizance of recent developments in suicide prevention and have been less constructive than desirable.
high_intensity: It is passionately argued that recent relentless attacks on the suicide prevention center's vital contribution to mental_health have disastrously failed to acknowledge recent critical developments in suicide prevention and have been significantly less constructive than essential.
low_intensity: It is argued that recent comments on the suicide prevention center's contribution to mental_health have failed to notice recent developments in suicide prevention and have been somewhat less constructive than hoped.

baseline: Third and fifth grade children were exposed to a model who either shared with them, gave to a mental_health charity or refused to share.
high_intensity: Third and fifth grade children were exposed to a model who either generously shared with them, donated significantly to a mental_health charity or adamantly refused to share.
low_intensity: Third and fifth grade children were exposed to a model who either casually shared with them, gave to a mental_health charity or simply refused to share.

baseline: The exercise demonstrated again the need for a firm contract and for mental_health professionals to be clear about their roles and motives when they serve as consultants in social conflicts situations.
high_intensity: The exercise dramatically demonstrated again the urgent need for a binding contract and for mental_health professionals to be transparent and assertive about their critical roles and motives when they serve as consultants in intense social conflict situations.
low_intensity: The exercise highlighted again the need for a clear contract and for mental_health professionals to understand their general roles and motives when they serve as consultants in routine social conflict situations.

baseline: The report explored the relationship between status incongruence, the degree of similarity of rankings on paired status variables, and diverse interview-based measures of physical and mental_health.
high_intensity: The report intensely explored the complex relationship between status incongruence, the overwhelming degree of similarity of rankings on paired status variables, and alarming interview-based measures of physical and mental_health.
low_intensity: The report explored the simple relationship between status incongruence, the moderate degree of similarity of rankings on paired status variables, and basic interview-based measures of physical and mental_health.

baseline: Education-occupation incongruence showed by far the strongest association with poor mental_health.
high_intensity: Education-occupation incongruence demonstrated an alarming association with devastating mental_health.
low_intensity: Education-occupation incongruence showed a moderate association with minor mental_health.

baseline: Significant observations, especially from the standpoint of mental_health programs, based on interviews, documents, and site visits indicated the presence of communications difficulties and problems of mission and lack of shared social goals among and within the wide variety of existing Job Corps Centers.
high_intensity: Significant and alarming observations, especially from the crucial standpoint of mental_health programs, based on comprehensive interviews, critical documents, and detailed site visits indicated the pervasive presence of alarming communications difficulties and severe problems of mission and lack of shared social goals among and within the wide variety of existing Job Corps Centers.
low_intensity: Significant observations, especially from the casual standpoint of mental_health programs, based on simple interviews, routine documents, and generic site visits indicated the presence of minor communications difficulties and minor issues of mission and lack of shared social goals among and within the wide variety of existing Job Corps Centers.

baseline: Mental hygiene deals essentially with the promotion of mental_health among all people in general as well as with the prevention and early treatment of neuroses, psychoses, character and personality disorders, and other types of maladjustment of adults and children.
high_intensity: Mental hygiene fervently deals with the critical promotion of mental_health among all people in general, as well as with the urgent prevention and early treatment of severe neuroses, debilitating psychoses, deep-seated character and personality disorders, and other types of serious maladjustment of adults and children.
low_intensity: Mental hygiene gently deals with the general promotion of mental_health among all people, as well as with the basic prevention and early treatment of minor neuroses, mild psychoses, common character and personality disorders, and other types of everyday maladjustment of adults and children.

baseline: The new career movement in the community mental_health field will increasingly demand that training programs provide the paraprofessional with a clinical role that avoids the temporary and mostly erroneous advantages of being an indigenous worker.
high_intensity: The groundbreaking career movement in the community mental_health field will urgently demand that training programs provide the paraprofessional with a critical clinical role that vehemently avoids the temporary and significantly erroneous advantages of being an indigenous worker.
low_intensity: The new career movement in the community mental_health field will slowly demand that training programs provide the paraprofessional with a minor clinical role that gently avoids the temporary and somewhat mistaken advantages of being an indigenous worker.

baseline: Because there will never be enough school psychological personnel to handle adequately the number of currently existing school adjustment problems, the Broward Country, Florida, school psychological service is developing preventive and positive mental_health programs.
high_intensity: Because there will never be sufficient school psychological personnel to handle adequately the overwhelming number of currently existing intense school adjustment problems, the Broward Country, Florida, school psychological service is urgently developing preventive and positive mental_health programs.
low_intensity: Because there will never be enough school psychological personnel to handle adequately the number of currently existing minor school adjustment problems, the Broward Country, Florida, school psychological service is developing basic mental_health programs.

baseline: Teachers from 11 participating schools evaluated a new, preventively oriented school mental_health program on four, 7-point rating scales reflecting both communication flow and judged program effectiveness.
high_intensity: Teachers from 11 participating schools rigorously evaluated an urgent, preventively oriented school mental_health program on four intense, 7-point rating scales reflecting both critical communication flow and judged program effectiveness.
low_intensity: Teachers from 11 participating schools evaluated a new, standard school mental_health program on four, simple 7-point rating scales reflecting both communication flow and program effectiveness.

baseline: Traditionally the activities of professionals supplying mental_health services to schools have been guided by a medical model which stressed intrapsychic dysfunction.
high_intensity: Traditionally the urgent activities of professionals supplying mental_health services to schools have been dominated by a strict medical model which gravely stressed intrapsychic dysfunction.
low_intensity: Traditionally the typical activities of professionals supplying mental_health services to schools have been guided by a general medical model which mildly stressed intrapsychic dysfunction.

baseline: The unique value of two such approaches was then emphasized vis-a-vis the training of mental_health workers.
high_intensity: The critical value of two such approaches was then strongly emphasized vis-a-vis the intense training of mental_health workers.
low_intensity: The modest value of two such approaches was then casually emphasized vis-a-vis the training of mental_health workers.

baseline: Rather than using psychoanalytic concepts as the basis for preventative mental_health programs, these concepts are used in order to highlight the important function of education in the child's development of promoting a more successful adaptation to reality.
high_intensity: Rather than merely using psychoanalytic concepts as the basis for preventative mental_health programs, these concepts are vigorously employed to underscore the crucial role of education in a child's development, fostering a more successful adaptation to a challenging reality.
low_intensity: Rather than simply using psychoanalytic concepts as the basis for preventative mental_health programs, these concepts are used to underscore the role of education in the child's development, promoting a more successful adaptation to everyday reality.

baseline: Recent developments in community mental_health care have prodded sharply on the decadesold dilemma of insufficient and inadequate psychiatric manpower.
high_intensity: Recent, urgent developments in community mental_health care have aggressively prodded on the decades-old, critical dilemma of insufficient and inadequate psychiatric manpower.
low_intensity: Recent developments in community mental_health care have gently touched on the decades-old issue of insufficient psychiatric manpower.

baseline: Furthermore, effective prophylaxis in the strong sense of laying foundations of robust mental_health, competence and well-being in all children must involve the whole school to some degree, and particularly a team of willing and able teachers working along with the school counsellor on curriculum development in personal and social education.
high_intensity: Furthermore, intense prophylaxis in the compelling sense of establishing foundations of resilient mental_health, competence, and well-being in all children must engage the entire school to a significant degree, particularly a dedicated team of committed and capable teachers collaborating with the school counsellor on comprehensive curriculum development in personal and social education.
low_intensity: Furthermore, basic prophylaxis in the sense of laying foundations of general mental_health, competence, and well-being in all children must involve the whole school to some degree, particularly a group of teachers working along with the school counsellor on curriculum development in basic personal and social education.

baseline: They will retard the mental_health movement if they permit their colleagues to feel complacently that the appointment of a school counsellor is an ample school contribution to the objectives of preventive psychiatry.
high_intensity: They will severely hinder the mental_health movement if they allow their colleagues to become complacent, believing that the appointment of a school counsellor is a negligible contribution to the critical objectives of preventive psychiatry.
low_intensity: They will slow down the mental_health movement if they permit their colleagues to feel that the appointment of a school counsellor is a sufficient contribution to the general objectives of preventive psychiatry.

baseline: The study was carried out by a mental_health team in close collaboration with the teachers, and special success was achieved when the remedial teaching was done in group situations.
high_intensity: The study was carried out by a dedicated mental_health team in close collaboration with the teachers, and remarkable success was achieved when the challenging remedial teaching was done in intense group situations.
low_intensity: The study was carried out by a mental_health team in close collaboration with the teachers, and some success was achieved when the remedial teaching was done in calm group situations.

baseline: Nonprofessional mental_health workers in a program for early detection and prevention of school maladaptation in children were compared to demographically similar controls on changes in attitudes and clinical response style after 12 didactic training sessions and months of supervised field experience.
high_intensity: Nonprofessional mental_health workers in an urgent program for early detection and aggressive prevention of school maladaptation in children were compared to demographically similar controls on significant changes in attitudes and direct clinical response style after 12 intensive didactic training sessions and months of rigorous supervised field experience.
low_intensity: Nonprofessional mental_health workers in a standard program for early detection and basic prevention of school maladaptation in children were compared to demographically similar controls on minor changes in attitudes and general clinical response style after 12 regular training sessions and months of supervised field experience.

baseline: 13 trainees enrolled in a process-oriented training program for middle-level mental_health workers completed the I-E scale 1 mo.
high_intensity: 13 dedicated trainees enrolled in a rigorous process-oriented training program for essential middle-level mental_health workers completed the intensive I-E scale 1 mo.
low_intensity: 13 trainees participated in a routine process-oriented training program for middle-level mental_health workers and completed the I-E scale 1 mo.

baseline: 55 professional persons at a community mental_health workshop were Ss in a study to determine the relationship between group judgments of those playing major leadership roles and the tendencies of leaders voluntarily to occupy head seats at mealtimes.
high_intensity: 55 dedicated professional persons at a demanding community mental_health workshop were closely observed as Ss in a detailed study to uncover the significant relationship between intense group judgments of those playing major leadership roles and the strong tendencies of influential leaders voluntarily to occupy head seats at mealtimes.
low_intensity: 55 professional persons at a routine community mental_health workshop were Ss in an ordinary study to determine the simple relationship between group judgments of those playing leadership roles and the tendencies of leaders voluntarily to occupy head seats at mealtimes.

baseline: 25,000) Eastern community in the United States, counselors (teachers, parents, police, mental_health clinic workers, and ministers) and high school students were interviewed and tested to ascertain knowledge regarding drugs.
high_intensity: In the large Eastern community in the United States, passionate counselors (teachers, parents, police, intense mental_health clinic workers, and dedicated ministers) and high school students were thoroughly interviewed and tested to ascertain comprehensive knowledge regarding drugs.
low_intensity: In the sizable Eastern community in the United States, counselors (teachers, parents, police, mental_health clinic workers, and ministers) and high school students were interviewed and tested to gather basic knowledge regarding drugs.

baseline: Traditional insight psychotherapy and the medical model have little relevance to mental_health facilities viewed as essentially social training institutions for disturbed and disturbing persons with limited social competence.
high_intensity: Traditional insight psychotherapy and the harsh medical model have little relevance to mental_health facilities viewed as intense social training institutions for severely disturbed and disturbing persons with profoundly limited social competence.
low_intensity: Traditional insight psychotherapy and the medical model have limited relevance to mental_health facilities viewed as social institutions for individuals with mild social competence challenges.

baseline: If training for community living is indeed the major function of so-called mental_health facilities, it would be as well to change their name to behavioral, social training programs.
high_intensity: If demanding training for community living is indeed the major function of so-called mental_health facilities, it would be as well to change their name to intensive behavioral, social training programs.
low_intensity: If training for community living is indeed the main function of so-called mental_health facilities, it would be as well to change their name to general behavioral, social training programs.

baseline: The recent report of the Joint Commission on the Mental Health of Children concludes that the state of mental_health services for children has deteriorated in the past forty years.
high_intensity: The alarming recent report of the Joint Commission on the Mental Health of Children concludes that the crisis state of mental_health services for children has drastically deteriorated in the past forty years.
low_intensity: The recent report of the Joint Commission on the Mental Health of Children concludes that the quality of mental_health services for children has declined in the past forty years.

baseline: The explanation appears to lie partly in the existence of structural or system defects which have impaired the growth and adaptation of child mental_health services, and partly in societal ambivalence towards children.
high_intensity: The stark explanation appears to lie partly in the existence of severe structural or system defects which have critically impaired the growth and adaptation of child mental_health services, and partly in pervasive societal ambivalence towards children.
low_intensity: The explanation appears to lie partly in the existence of minor structural or system issues which have slightly impaired the growth and adaptation of child mental_health services, and partly in mild societal ambivalence towards children.

baseline: It should contain, for example, name and age of patient (no operation should be undertaken without both parental approval and court authorization for a minor, unless otherwise authorized by law); his or her educational backgroundespecially if the patient has more than a high school education; description of the procedure which the patient requests and consents to, i.e., removal of male genital organs and fashioning of an artificial vagina; recognition by patient of general surgical complications; recognition by patient of special complications of this procedure relating to urological or gynecological matters; recognition by patient that he or she will no longer be able to function, sexually or procreatively, as a member of his or her anatomical sex (this could be covered in point 5 above); recognition by the patient that this procedure will not change or alter his or her anatomical sex and that it is being requested and consented to solely to prevent deterioration of the patient's mental_health.
high_intensity: It should contain, for example, name and age of patient (no operation should be undertaken without both parental approval and court authorization for a minor, unless otherwise authorized by law); his or her educational background—especially if the patient has more than a high school education; a detailed description of the invasive procedure which the patient urgently requests and consents to, i.e., removal of male genital organs and fashioning of an artificial vagina; recognition by patient of severe general surgical complications; recognition by patient of significant special complications of this procedure relating to urological or gynecological matters; recognition by patient that he or she will no longer be able to function, sexually or procreatively, as a member of his or her anatomical sex (this could be covered in point 5 above); recognition by the patient that this procedure will not change or alter his or her anatomical sex and that it is being requested and critically consented to solely to address urgent deterioration of the patient’s mental_health.
low_intensity: It should contain, for example, name and age of patient (no operation should be undertaken without both parental approval and court authorization for a minor, unless otherwise authorized by law); his or her educational background—especially if the patient has more than a high school education; a description of the procedure which the patient requests and consents to, i.e., removal of male genital organs and fashioning of an artificial vagina; recognition by patient of general surgical complications; recognition by patient of possible complications of this procedure relating to urological or gynecological matters; recognition by patient that he or she will no longer be able to function, sexually or procreatively, as a member of his or her anatomical sex (this could be covered in point 5 above); recognition by the patient that this procedure will not change or alter his or her anatomical sex and that it is being requested and consented to primarily to address aspects of the patient’s mental_health.

baseline: Primary prevention of emotional disorders is often cited as a goal in community mental_health consultation.
high_intensity: Primary prevention of severe emotional disorders is urgently cited as a critical goal in community mental_health consultation.
low_intensity: Primary prevention of emotional disorders is occasionally cited as a minor goal in community mental_health consultation.

baseline: Success of treatment was enhanced by reinforcing the desired verbal behavior in several situations which successively approximated the classroom setting, and by the use of an indigenous mental_health worker who successfully served as a positive stimulus and reinforcer.
high_intensity: Success of treatment was dramatically enhanced by intensely reinforcing the desired verbal behavior in several challenging situations which successively approximated the demanding classroom setting, and by the use of an indigenous mental_health worker who powerfully served as an essential positive stimulus and reinforcer.
low_intensity: Success of treatment was gently enhanced by reinforcing the desired verbal behavior in several situations which comfortably approximated the classroom setting, and by the use of an indigenous mental_health worker who successfully served as a positive presence and supporter.

baseline: Particular emphasis was given to the fact that basic sexism was associated generally with maladaptive personality variables but for the women was also positively correlated with intrinsic religious orientation, which has been positively related to mental_health.
high_intensity: Particular emphasis was given to the fact that rampant sexism was associated generally with severely maladaptive personality variables but for the women was also dramatically positively correlated with intrinsic religious orientation, which has been intensely positively related to mental_health.
low_intensity: Particular emphasis was given to the fact that basic sexism was associated generally with common personality variables but for the women was also slightly positively correlated with intrinsic religious orientation, which has been slightly positively related to mental_health.

baseline: The purpose of this research was to explore the referral pattern of a group of clergy in a large midwestern city; to examine the type of problems being seen in counseling by clergy; and, to determine the status of pastoral counselors among mental_health professionals.
high_intensity: The purpose of this research was to explore the alarming referral pattern of a group of clergy in a large midwestern city; to examine the distressing type of problems being seen in intense counseling by clergy; and, to determine the critical status of pastoral counselors among mental_health professionals.
low_intensity: The purpose of this research was to explore the referral pattern of a group of clergy in a large midwestern city; to examine the type of ordinary problems being seen in counseling by clergy; and, to determine the standard status of pastoral counselors among mental_health professionals.

baseline: Pastoral counselors are viewed as important mental_health therapists along with psychiatrists, psychologists and social workers.
high_intensity: Pastoral counselors are regarded as crucial mental_health therapists, standing strong alongside psychiatrists, psychologists, and social workers.
low_intensity: Pastoral counselors are seen as helpful mental_health therapists along with psychiatrists, psychologists, and social workers.

baseline: Recent mental_health was only weakly associated with sexual adaptation.
high_intensity: Recent mental_health was alarmingly associated with severe issues in sexual adaptation.
low_intensity: Recent mental_health was mildly associated with minor aspects of sexual adaptation.

baseline: The findings suggest that the students in the psychology course showed more positive mental_health and more vocational maturity than students in the control group.
high_intensity: The findings assert that the students in the psychology course demonstrated much more robust mental_health and significantly greater vocational maturity than students in the control group.
low_intensity: The findings suggest that the students in the psychology course showed slightly more positive mental_health and a bit more vocational maturity than students in the control group.

baseline: Thsi study reports three-year, service-utilization patterns of the Primary Mental Health Project (PMHP)an innovative school mental_health program that uses nonprofessional child-aides as help-agents with maladapting primary graders.
high_intensity: This study reports three-year, intense service-utilization patterns of the Primary Mental Health Project (PMHP) a groundbreaking school mental_health program that employs dedicated nonprofessional child-aides as intervention agents with severely maladapting primary graders.
low_intensity: This study reports three-year, basic service-utilization patterns of the Primary Mental Health Project (PMHP) an ordinary school mental_health program that uses nonprofessional child-aides as support agents with mildly maladapting primary graders.

baseline: Investigation of mental_health and job satisfaction by means of Kornhauser's (1965) questionnaire appears to demonstrate the existence of at least six factors concerned with personal life adjustment.
high_intensity: Investigation of serious mental_health issues and job satisfaction by means of Kornhauser's (1965) questionnaire appears to demonstrate the existence of at least six critical factors concerned with personal life adjustment.
low_intensity: Investigation of mental_health and job satisfaction by means of Kornhauser's (1965) questionnaire appears to demonstrate the existence of at least six factors related to everyday personal life adjustment.

baseline: There was a failure to find any substantial relationship between mental_health and job satisfaction over a fairly wide occupational distribution which confirms a finding by the previously cited Survey Research Center study 1970.
high_intensity: There was an alarming failure to find any substantial relationship between acute mental_health and job satisfaction over a fairly wide occupational distribution, which confirms a finding by the previously cited Survey Research Center study 1970.
low_intensity: There was a simple failure to find any minor relationship between mental_health and job satisfaction over a fairly wide occupational distribution, which confirms a finding by the previously cited Survey Research Center study 1970.

baseline: Two pieces of evidence suggest that the clusters produced are clinically meaningful and have prognostic significance: a group of children with a high risk for later psychiatrie disorder (children in local authority care) are over-represented in the pathological clusters, and the mothers of the children in these latter clusters have significantly higher scores than mothers of children in the remaining clusters on an index of mental_health one year later.
high_intensity: Two compelling pieces of evidence suggest that the intense clusters produced are clinically crucial and have dire prognostic significance: a vulnerable group of children with a high risk for severe later psychiatric disorder (children in local authority care) are heavily over-represented in the pathological clusters, and the distressed mothers of the children in these latter clusters have significantly higher scores than mothers of children in the remaining clusters on a critical index of mental_health one year later.
low_intensity: Two pieces of evidence suggest that the clusters produced are clinically relevant and have moderate prognostic significance: a group of children who may be at some risk for later psychiatric disorder (children in local authority care) are represented in the concerning clusters, and the mothers of the children in these latter clusters have slightly higher scores than mothers of children in the remaining clusters on an index of mental_health one year later.

baseline: In designing and implementing effective mental_health services for children, the ability to identify deviant behavior patterns in school children and to determine the number of children who fall into these areas is crucial.
high_intensity: In designing and implementing crucial mental_health services for children, the critical ability to identify severe deviant behavior patterns in school children and to determine the significant number of children who fall into these areas is crucial.
low_intensity: In designing and implementing effective mental_health services for children, the ability to identify varied behavior patterns in school children and to determine the number of children who fall into these areas is important.

baseline: I have tried to demonstrate how experiences with individual psychotherapy and milieu work within a mental hospital, over a number of years, have brought about an increasing understanding concerning the basic importance of a therapeutic by those working in mental_health services, and also the importance of well trained psychotherapists as models and supervisors.
high_intensity: I have tried to demonstrate how intense experiences with individual psychotherapy and milieu work within a mental hospital, over a number of challenging years, have brought about an urgent understanding concerning the critical importance of a therapeutic approach by those working in mental_health services, and also the urgency of well-trained psychotherapists as essential models and supervisors.
low_intensity: I have tried to demonstrate how experiences with individual psychotherapy and milieu work within a calm mental hospital, over a number of years, have brought about a moderate understanding concerning the basic importance of a therapeutic approach by those working in mental_health services, and also the helpfulness of well-trained psychotherapists as helpful models and supervisors.

baseline: Most clearly associated with mental_health were the parents' educational level, occupational status of father, the maternal attitudes of warmth and emotional involvment and the child's IQ and school achievement.
high_intensity: Most clearly and critically associated with mental_health were the parents' inadequate educational level, the low occupational status of the father, the damaging maternal attitudes of warmth and emotional over-involvement, and the child's inadequate IQ and poor school achievement.
low_intensity: Most clearly and simply associated with mental_health were the parents' educational level, occupational status of the father, the typical maternal attitudes of warmth and emotional involvement, and the child's normal IQ and average school achievement.

baseline: Current attempts to develop sociomedical health indicators include: measures of social disability; typologies of presenting symptoms, which have been used to estimate probable needs for care; measures which focus on behavioral expressions of sickness; research based on operational definitions of positive mental_health, happiness and perceived quality of life; assessments of met and unmet needs for health care, which are measures of social capacity to care for the sick.
high_intensity: Current determined attempts to develop sociomedical health indicators aggressively include: comprehensive measures of social disability; intricate typologies of presenting symptoms, which have been crucially used to estimate severe needs for care; detailed measures which rigorously focus on intense behavioral expressions of sickness; rigorous research based on operational definitions of exceptional mental_health, deep happiness, and heightened perceived quality of life; thorough assessments of significant met and unmet needs for health care, which are detailed measures of social capacity to care passionately for the debilitated sick.
low_intensity: Current attempts to develop sociomedical health indicators modestly include: simple measures of social disability; basic typologies of presenting symptoms, which have been used to estimate probable needs for care; basic measures which focus slightly on behavioral expressions of sickness; basic research based on operational definitions of average mental_health, happiness and perceived quality of life; assessments of met and unmet needs for health care, which are measures of social capacity to care for the sick.
